sales_text.title: Tie-up with WM Firm
sales_text.text: Advisors with 1 to 3 years of tie up with WM firm, with 10,348 accounts under them, showed the maximum AUM Growth 7.60% in 2021.

sales_text.title: Number of client accounts
sales_text.text: Advisors with 2 to 3 clients under them held 7665 accounts under them and showed the Net Flow Change of 9.30% (max in its category), in 2021.

sales_text.title: Net worth category
sales_text.text: Advisors with Net Worth between 0 to $250K had 17246 accounts under them and showed the maximum AUM Growth of 6.40%, in 2021.

sales_text.title: Generation
sales_text.text: Advisors from the Baby Boomers Generation have the maximum number of accounts and showed the highest AUM Growth of 7.10% in 2021
